query:
UPDATE
                    groups g
                SET
                    title = $3
                WHERE
                    g.id = $2 AND
                    EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups ug
                        WHERE
                            ug.group_id = g.id AND
                            ug.user_id = $1
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: GroupId",
                    title,
                    uid
